name: crafty-shield
flavor_text: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
effect_text_extend:
Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn.

Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
effect_text_simple: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.
